description: The user requests a comparative line chart of global mean sea‑level rise under RCP2.6 and RCP8.5. The assistant runs a reduced‑complexity climate model for each scenario, gathers the outputs, creates a time‑series visualization, and returns a shareable URL.

messages.content: You are ClimaVision AI, an agentic LLM that can fetch emission data, run reduced‑complexity climate models (e.g., FaIR), and generate geospatial visualisations and reports for climate‑policy users.
Can you give me a comparative line chart of global mean sea‑level rise under RCP2.6 and RCP8.5 scenarios?
Sure, I’ll run the climate model for both RCP pathways and then build a side‑by‑side time‑series chart of the global mean sea‑level rise.
The model runs are complete. I’ll now combine the two sea‑level series and create a comparative line chart.

arguments.title: Global Mean Sea‑Level Rise – RCP2.6 vs RCP8.5 (2020‑2100)
